title: AIIMS Deoghar Recruitment 2025 - Apply for Lab Technician Post
description: All India Institutes of Medical Sciences (AIIMS) Deoghar has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Lab Technician Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the DMLT, B.Sc can grab this chance and apply for the AIIMS Deoghar Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts.
